description: {"blocks":[{"key":"d0skh","text":"This protocol describes the RNA isolation from cultured cells and quantitative RT PCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"4bvpe","text":"Reagents require:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1lt4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j0nd","text":"RNeasy Micro Plus kit (Qiagen)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddvmq","text":"iScript cDNA synthesis Kit (Bio-Rad)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d8t0a","text":"Primers","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5cbj","text":"SYBR Green Master Mix (BioRad)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9h5ar","text":"96 well plates (BioRad)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8rhaf","text":"Optical Adhesive Covers","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"58cvj","text":"Aspirate media from cells and rinse cells with PBS  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8mvss","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D1CCD0D0FABC11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2e7n","text":"Isolate RNA using RNeasy Micro Plus kit (Qiagen) according to manufacturer’s protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tfko","text":"Generate cDNA from   purified RNA using iScript cDNA synthesis Kit (Bio-Rad) according to manufacturer’s protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ju19","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"DA4E65C0FABC11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":4}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"do0tu","text":"The iScript cDNA was diluted 1:10 by using sterile water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dbbu","text":"Combine   SYBR Green Master Mix (BioRad) with   Sterile Water per sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eamjb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"EA4D3F00FABC11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6.78","error":false,"guid":"EEE0D0E0FABC11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ipv1","text":"Combine   diluted SYBR Green Master Mix with   each of   forward and reverse primers per sample. Pipette this mixture into wells of 96-well qPCR plate 2 technical replicates were ran for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"82rjt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"16.78","error":false,"guid":"FB2FE890FABC11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.61","error":false,"guid":"FE818490FABC11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"0AAF3190FABD11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"acaqm","text":"Pipette   of diluted RNA from step 4 in well with SYBR Green Master Mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"30cmn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"1D0E41F0FABD11ED91413B863AA9C18A","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6f45j","text":"Run qPCR in CFX96 Real-Time System (BioRad) using the following PCR steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"586cb","text":"Calculate the ΔCT values by subtracting respective gene CT value from housekeeping gene GAPDH value.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9kgmv","text":"Followed by calculating 2ΔCT values, normalize the mRNA expression levels for genes of interest to GAPDH and represented relative to control.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":25,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: RNA isolation and qRT-PCR
